org.antfarmer.ejce.hibernate

Class AbstractLobType

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.antfarmer.ejce.hibernate.AbstractHibernateType
      • org.antfarmer.ejce.hibernate.AbstractLobType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParameterizedType, UserType
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EncryptedBlobType, EncryptedClobType

    public abstract class AbstractLobType
extends AbstractHibernateType
    Abstract extension of AbstractHibernateType for LOB types that encrypts as well as compresses arbitrarily large binary data.
    See Also:
    AbstractHibernateType

      • setStream

        protected void setStream(PreparedStatement st,
                         int index,
                         InputStream is)
                  throws IOException,
                         SQLException
        Sets the InputStream on the given PreparedStatement. If the given InputStream contains less data than the maxInMemoryBuffSize setting, the data will be set on the PreparedStatement using an in-memory byte array, unless the stream LOB's option is enabled. If maximum buffer size is exceeded, the stream will be set via a temporary file to determine its true length and limit memory usage.
        Parameters:
        st - the PreparedStatement
        index - the parameter index
        is - the InputStream
        Throws:
        IOException - IOException
        SQLException - SQLException
